attributes.action: Let Ukrainians in the UK choose their future, not be hostages politic deals
attributes.additional_details:
We urge the UK government to provide a clear path to status resolution, recognizing Ukrainians' right to stay if they choose. Their future must not be dictated by external pressure or commitments to other countries.

Ukrainians deserve the freedom to make their own decisions without coercion to return based on political considerations.
attributes.background:
Ukrainians who found refuge in the UK must have the right to determine their own future. They are not government property and should not be hostages of political agreements.

Many have already integrated.However, current policies prioritize geopolitical interests over individual rights

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You may wish to sign these petitions which call for similar actions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700776
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710067
